variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject identifier [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [visit 1] [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA1
variable.description: Q1. A. Active living. How many minutes a day you usually walk and or bicycle to and from work, school or errands? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: At least 5 but less than 15 minutes
At least 15 but less than 30 minutes
At least 30 but less than 45 minutes

variable.name: PACA2
variable.description: Q2. A. Active living. How many city blocks do you usually walk each day to and from work or doing errands? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: At least 5 but less than 10 blocks
At least 10 but less than 15 blocks
At least 15 but less than 20 blocks

variable.name: PACA3
variable.description: Q3. A. Active living. During leisure time, how often did you walk for at least 15 minutes at a time? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA4
variable.description: Q4. A. Active living. During leisure time how often did you bike for at least 15 minutes at a time? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA5
variable.description: Q5. A. Active living. During leisure time how often do you sweat from exertion? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA6
variable.description: Q6. A. Active living. During the past year how often did you watch television? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: At least 1 hour a week but less than 7 hours a week
At least 1 hour a day but less than 2 hours a day
At least 2 hours a day but less than 4 hours a day

variable.name: PACA7
variable.description: Q7. A. Active living. During a usual week in the past year about how many times a week did you do physical exercise in your free time for at least 20 minutes without stopping? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA8
variable.description: Q8. B. Occupational activities. Did you work for pay or do volunteer work during the past year? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA9
variable.description: Q9. B. Occupational activities. In comparison with other men (women) of your age do you think your work is physically much lighter, lighter, the same as, heavier, or much heavier? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA10
variable.description: Q10. B. Occupational activities. After work physically tired? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA11A
variable.description: Q11a. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: sit [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA11B
variable.description: Q11b. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: stand [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA11C
variable.description: Q11c. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: walk [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA11D
variable.description: Q11d. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: lift heavy loads [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA11E
variable.description: Q11e. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: sweat from exertion [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA12
variable.description: Q12. C. Home, family, yard and garden. During the past year how much time did you spend caring for children under 5 years of age or for a disabled child or elderly person? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: At least 1 but less than 20 hours per week

variable.name: PACA13
variable.description: Q13. C. Home, family, yard and garden. During the past year how much time did you spend preparing meals or clearing up from meals? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: At least 1/2 hour but less than 1 hour per day
At least 1 hour but less than 1 1/2 hours per day
At least 1 1/2 hours but less than 2 hours per day

variable.name: PACA14
variable.description: Q14. C. Home, family, yard and garden. During the past year how much time did you spend doing major clearing activities such as shampooing carpets, waxing floors, washing windows or washing a car or other vehicle? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA15
variable.description: Q15. C. Home, family, yard and garden. During the past year how much time did you spend doing routine cleaning such as dusting, laundry, vacuuming, changing bed sheets or grocery shopping and pushing a cart? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA16
variable.description: Q16. C. Home, family, yard and garden. During the past year how much time did you spend doing gardening or yard work, such as mowing lawn or racing leaves? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA17
variable.description: Q17. C. Home, family, yard and garden. During the past year how much time did you sped doing heavy outdoor work such as chopping wood, tilling soil, shoveling or bailing hay? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA18
variable.description: Q18. C. Home, family, yard and garden. During the past year how much time did you spend doing major home decoration or repair, such as plumbing, tiling, painting or building? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA19
variable.description: Q19. D. Sports and exercise. During the past year did you participate in any of these activities of in any other similar activities not included on the last? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA20
variable.description: Q20. D. Sports and exercise. Ho often did you paly sports or exercise during the past year? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: Never or less than once a month

variable.name: PACA21A
variable.description: Q21a. D. Sports and exercise. Which sport or exercise did you do most frequently? Is this activity on code list? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA21B
variable.description: Q21b. D. Sports and exercise. Which sport or exercise did you do most frequently? Code for most frequent sport/exercise [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA22
variable.description: Q22. D. Sports and exercise. How many months in the past year did you do this activity? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA23
variable.description: Q23. D. Sports and exercise. How many hours a week did you do this activity [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: At least 1 but less than 2 hours
At least 2 but less than 3 hours
At least 3 but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PACA24A
variable.description: Q24a. D. Sports and exercise. What was the second most frequent sport or exercise you did? Is this activity on the code list [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA24B
variable.description: Q24b. D. Sports and exercise. What was the second most frequent sport or exercise you did? Code for second most frequent sport or exercise [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA25
variable.description: Q25. D. Sports and exercise. How many months in the past year did you do this activity? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA26
variable.description: Q26. D. Sports and exercise. Ho many hours a week did you do this activity? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: At least 1 but less than 2 hours
At least 2 but less than 3 hours
At least 3 but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PACA27A
variable.description: Q27a. D. Sports and exercise. What was the third most frequent sport or exercise you did? Activity on code list [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA27B
variable.description: Q27b. D. Sports and exercise. What was the third most frequent sport or exercise you did? 3rd most frequent sport or exercise code [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA28
variable.description: Q28. D. Sports and exercise. How many months in the past year did you do this activity? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]

variable.name: PACA29
variable.description: Q29. D. Sports and exercise. How many hours a week did you do this activities? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
variable.value: At least 1 but less than 2 hours
At least 2 but less than 3 hours
At least 3 but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PACA30
variable.description: Q30. D. Sports and exercise. In comparison with others of your own age, do you think your recreation activity is much less, less, the same as, more, or much more? [Visit 1] [Physical Activity Form, PAC]
